author: vvalchev
msg: Fixed FELIX-4560 : Unsynchonized access to map can cause infinite loop in UPnP web console plugin

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1966 - Add Hint for selecting more performant index in MongoDocumentStore#query

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-1966 - Add Hint for selecting more performant index in MongoDocumentStore#query
_modified index would be used if the delta between now and time being queried for is less than 120 secs (configurable via oak.mongo.maxDeltaForModTimeIdxSecs)
